Vulois

Vulois got up.

"No Child. You are still weak. We will attack soon, but not now. I 
can beat the vok. I know it. And if I can tap into your mind, I can 
release your true power. If you want a chance to beat them, than come 
back to me.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream tried to dodge the auto-guns, but most of it hit him in 
the back. With all his armor singed from before it was excruciating 
pain. He got up, transformer, stumbled over to Reptillica and slapped 
him in the face.

"I must not be very dumb, because if I were I wouldn't know that the 
quicker I see Zardus the quicker you have a chance to escape 
Megatron. Now open the door!"
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers w/ Savage

Trainer arrived in eye sight distance of the Ark. Prebon examined the 
situation.

"Hmmmm..... Some bots over there. A bot lying on the ground, and an 
alomst destroyed ship. Perfect. Move out!"

Blaze, Ignatius, Bullet and Hammer ran out first, guns blazing at all 
the bots. Next came Prebon, riding atop Savage, shooting fireballs at 
the hull.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

After a bit of rummagin, Brix and Fliq thought they found a suitable 
piece of rubble.

"Come, let's go use it."

They broought it back to Ramulus.

"Come on, help us attach it."

Brix and Fliq started attaching the metal.
